messages.content: I have three book from the library.
Oh, you have three books from the library? Which one is your favorite?
The red one. It is about space.
That sounds amazing! Enjoy reading all three books.
My uncle lives with us. He go to work everyday by bike, even when raining.
That's impressive! He goes to work every day by bicycle? He must be very fit.
Yes, he think driving is too expensive and subway too crowded.
What a healthy choice! Going to work every day on a bike keeps him strong.
I go to school yesterday.
Oh, yesterday? So you went to school yesterday? How was your day?
Yes, I went. It was good day.
Wonderful! You went to school yesterday and had a good day. Keep up the great work!
She is good teacher. She helped me improve my writing.
That's wonderful to hear. She is a good teacher—does she give you specific feedback on your essays?
Yes, she always shows me how to organize my ideas better.
Excellent! It sounds like you're making real progress with her support.
I go to school yesterday.
Oh, you went to school yesterday? How was your day there?
Yes, I went to school. It was very good.
Wonderful! I'm glad you went to school and had a good day.
Yesterday I go to school and we have a big test.
Yesterday I went to school early too! How did the test go?
It was okay, but I am tired because I wake up at six.
You went to school and finished the test even after waking up so early. That's really impressive dedication!
She is good teacher. I want to be like her one day.
Oh, so she is a good teacher who inspires you? What grade does she teach?
She teaches grade ten. She makes difficult topics easy to understand.
It sounds like she is a good teacher to learn from. I'm sure you'll achieve your goal!

correct_form: I have a lot of information

messages.content: I have many informations about the project.
Oh, interesting! So you have a lot of information to share?
Yes, I have a lot of information about the history and the culture.
That's wonderful—you're already explaining things so clearly!
I am agree with you about the homework. Is too much for today.
You agree with me about the homework? I'm glad to hear that! I agree with you completely—we do have a lot to finish. Which section should we start with first?
Maybe we start with the reading. Is more difficult for me.
That's a smart plan! Reading first, then writing. I love how you're organizing your work today!
He want to eat.
Ah, he wants to eat pasta or pizza?
He wants to eat pizza.
Yes, he wants to eat pizza. Great job!
I have three book.
Three books! That sounds interesting. What are you reading about?
I reading about animals. Very interesting.
Wonderful! Reading three books about animals will teach you so many new words. Keep up the great work!
She is good teacher.
Oh, she is a good teacher? What subject does she teach?
She teaches mathematics. She explains everything very clearly.
That's wonderful! Having a good teacher who explains things so well makes such a big difference in learning.
I have three book at home about Chinese history.
Three books about Chinese history sounds fascinating. Which dynasty do you enjoy reading about the most?
I like Tang dynasty. These books tell many stories about Tang poetry and famous poets.
Wonderful! It sounds like those three books are giving you a deep look into such a rich period of your culture.
Yesterday my friends came to my house for dinner. They was happy to try my cooking.
That's lovely! So they were happy with the food? What did you make for them?
I made kabsa and hummus. They ate everything and stayed late talking.
It sounds like they really enjoyed the evening. You must be a great host!
My mother work in Madrid. She is teacher.
Oh, so she is a teacher in Madrid? That's a great city to work in! What grade does she teach?
Yes, she is a teacher for small children. She love her job very much.
That's wonderful! Being a teacher for young kids is such important work. She must be very patient and kind.
Yesterday I go to school early to finish my homework.
Yesterday you went to school early? That shows a lot of dedication. Were you able to finish everything?
Yes, I finished math and English, but I need more time for science.
That's great progress! I'm glad you went in early to get a head start.
This is my sister. She is teacher in Barcelona.
Oh, she is a teacher in Barcelona? That sounds like an interesting job. What subject does she teach?
She teach history. She is a teacher for secondary students.
History is fascinating! Teaching teenagers is challenging but rewarding. You're doing a wonderful job describing your family!
I had my first lesson with the new tutor today. She is good teacher. Very helpful.
Oh, she is a good teacher? I'm glad the first lesson went well. What subject is she helping you with?
She is helping me prepare for the IELTS exam. She gives me a lot of writing tips.
That's fantastic! A good teacher who knows the exam well will definitely boost your confidence. You're in good hands.
I am agree with you about the homework. It is too much for one night.
Yeah, I agree with you there. Three chapters is a lot to read by tomorrow, right?
Yes, I agree. Maybe the teacher will give us more time if we ask.
That's a great way to put it! I love how you're sharing your opinion so clearly.
I go to school yesterday.
Oh, yesterday? So you went to school yesterday? How was your day?
Yes, I went to school. I see my friends and we play football.
That's wonderful! I'm glad you went to school yesterday and had fun with your friends. Keep practicing!
I have three book.
Three books? That sounds like a nice collection. What are they about?
They are mystery novel. I bought them last week.
Those sound exciting! Three mystery novels should keep you busy for a while.
My brother, he want to eat now.
Oh, he wants to eat? What does he want?
He wants to eat pizza.
Great! He wants pizza. That sounds delicious.
I have three book in my bag.
Oh, you have three books? What are they about?
Yes, three books. They are for my English class.
Wonderful! Bringing three books to practice with shows you're really dedicated.
I go to school yesterday.
Oh, you went to school yesterday? How was your day there?
Yes, it was busy day. I had many classes.
That sounds like a full schedule, but I'm glad you went and got through all those classes. You're doing a wonderful job sharing details about your week!

correct_form: She is a very beautiful girl

messages.content: She is very beautiful girl.
She is a very beautiful girl? Tell me more about her!
She is my best friend from high school. She is a very kind person.
That's wonderful! She sounds like she is a very beautiful girl both inside and out.
I go to school yesterday.
I went to school yesterday too! Did you have a long day there?
Yes, I stayed until five. Very tired.
Wonderful! You're doing a great job sharing your experiences in English.
I go to school yesterday.
Oh, you went to school yesterday? What did you study there?
I study math. Very difficult.
Math is hard, but you went to class and tried your best. Great job participating today!
My cousin live in Madrid. She is teacher in primary school.
Oh, she is a teacher in a primary school? That must be fun working with little kids.
Yes, very fun. She like children very much.
That's lovely! Being a teacher is such meaningful work. I'm sure she is a great teacher!
I have three book.
Three books? That sounds like a good reading list! What kind are they?
Two are novel and one is science book.
Perfect! Three books will give you a nice variety. Enjoy your reading!
